name: The Blue Critter Adventure!
description:
This is my first game, made with Gdevelop.  Most regions can be explored with platforming, but there  are also top-down and point and click sections. And you sure will find  some bugs other than the main character...

This is the demo of the game, three rooms, most of the large cave and one of the secret rooms are already accessible, the rest still needs some work :-)

I hope you'll check out The Blue Critter Adventure and let me know what you think!
